description_data.value: ** RESERVED ** This candidate has been reserved by an organization or individual that will use it when announcing a new security problem. When the candidate has been publicized, the details for this candidate will be provided.

descriptions.value: SQL injection vulnerability in Employee Management System v.1.0 allows a local attacker to obtain sensitive information via a crafted payload to the txtemail parameter in the login.php.

Una vulnerabilidad de inyección SQL en Employee Management System v.1.0 permite a un atacante local obtener información confidencial a través de un payload manipulado en el parámetro txtemail en login.php.
